short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TaskScale.net collect to Inbox helper plugin.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps you to collect data into your Inbox in the TaskScale.net app.

While working on different tasks you often have a need to write down an idea or a task to get back to it later. 
You don't want to fall off the current context! 
You don't want to switch tabs and find a place where you can put the note! 
You don't want to worry if you can find the note later!

And this is where our extension fits best.
Just click the extension icon on any opened browser tab, write the note and press Enter.
You will always know where to find your notes - in the Inbox folder, where you usually put your unsorted notes and tasks. And it fits perfectly into Getting Things Done methodology!

A couple of tips to make your experience even more smooth:
 - don't forget to pin your extension to the browser panel. It will make it accessible n any browser tab with one click
 - assign a hotkey for the extension in Chrome. Then you don't even need to touch a mouse to leave a note.
